resources.string: "Bachelor's and Master's degree in geophysics, graduation with honors, winning a number of scholarship programs, ability to investigate and solve problems, honesty, reliability, more than 4 years of experience in geophysical research and mapping, as well as high interest in this field, ability to work with a team will make sure that I will play an important role in the development of your company"

"3 AUG 2019 – CURRENT – Baku, Azerbaijan Geophysical Surveyor and Mapping - SOCAR Researched legal descriptions and survey maps to verify property lines and gather requisite information for mapping ; Developed and created GIS maps as requested by implementing ArcMap and analyzing relevant data ; Assisted in data management and organization, including vector and raster data ; Spatial data coordinate system conversion ; Collect field data using GPS and other field equipment,as well as operation GIS-specific hardware including large format plotters and scanners.
6 JUN 2017 – 4 JUL 2018 – Baku, Azerbaijan Geophysicist - SOCAR Analyze and interpret geological data, using computer software; Prepare geological maps, cross-sectional diagrams, charts, or reports concerning mineral extraction, land use, or resource management, using results of fieldwork or laboratory research; Measure characteristics of the Earth, such as gravity or magnetic fields, using equipment such as seismographs, gravimeters, torsion balances, or magnetometers.
1 JAN 2017 – 4 JUN 2017 – Baku, Azerbaijan Field Engineer - AZEA CONSTRUCTION Developing construction project budgets ; Overseeing progress and safety on construction sites ; Gathering resources, including employees, tools, machines and physical materials . "

"SEP 2012 – JUL 2016 – Azerbaijan Well logging Azerbaijan State Oil and Industry University
SEP 2016 – JUL 2018 - Azerbaijan Geophysical engineering Azerbaijan State Oil and Industry University "
" MOTHER TONGUE(S): Azerbaijani OTHER LANGUAGE(S): English Listening : B1 Reading : B2 Spoken production : B1 Spoken interaction : A2 Writing : B1"
"My Digital Skills Microsoft Office / Google Map - Google Earth / ArcGIS pro / ArcScene / MapInfo / Petrel® - Analysis and interpretation of seismic data from Gullfaks Field / CorelDraw / QGIS "
Location : Sumgait city , U.Hajibeyov str.,9th-mcr, Ap-75, AZ 5001 Sumgait, Azerbaijan"
